main event: An unidentified object was observed in North Concord, Vermont on August 7, 1960, exhibiting a bright light and an oval shape, moving erratically with a pulsating light before disappearing behind a tree.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 2-3 minutes., The object was described as having a bright light and moving erratically., Observers noted that the object might be a meteor, aircraft, or astronomical object., The sky was clear with dark conditions during the sighting., There were no confirmed other witnesses or photographs taken.
sighted object: an oval-shaped object with a bright, pulsating light
witness description: Unspecified observer from North Concord AFB
